玄幻奇幻::/shuku/1_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1
武侠仙侠::/shuku/2_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1
都市青春::/shuku/3_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1
历史军事::/shuku/4_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1
科幻灵异::/shuku/5_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1
游戏竞技::/shuku/6_1_0_0_0_searchPage_0_1

ruleBookContent:
<js>
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="content">([\s\S]*?)<\/div/)[1]).html();



var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);

//还原屏蔽段落

content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~\[\];[A-Z]=\{___.*?[A-Z],\$__\$:\+\+[A-Z]}\;/,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\+||"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z].*?\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/,"")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\('/,"")
.replace(/'\).*/,"")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/[A-Z]\._(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
result=String(a+unescape(content));
result=result.replace(/防采集自动加载失败，点击手动加载，推荐安装最新版浏览器！/,"")

</js>
